What are the genetic changes related to spondyloepiphyseal dysplasia congenita ?,"Spondyloepiphyseal dysplasia congenita is one of a spectrum of skeletal disorders caused by mutations in the COL2A1 gene. This gene provides instructions for making a protein that forms type II collagen. This type o
